thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Paul Fiduccia
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Paul Fiduccia

author: Paul Fiduccia
title: Paul Fiduccia
text: We were happy with our car rental experience. We were assigned the type of car that we requested. We picked up our vehicle in Christchurch city which was walking distance from our apartment. The staff at both checkin and check out were courteous and helpful. When we arrived at a our final destination in Picton we were driven to the ferry. Nice touch.
